item.description:
The Hidden-Tech Board invites all of you to our annual Holiday Social. It?s
been a while since we?ve had a get-together, and we?d love to have you join
us and your fellow Hidden-Techies to celebrate the holidays. See some old
friends and meet some new ones...a great event if you?re new to Hidden-Tech.
The lovely Coolidge Cafe Bar at the Hotel Northampton is a great place to
mix and mingle, at a premier Northampton location with easy parking. We hope
to see you there!

Refreshments: cheese/fruit/crackers and vegetable crudite with herb dip will
be served--drinks and sandwiches can be purchased at Coolidge Park Bar and
Cafe

Suggested donation: COMPLEMENTARY! Bring your good cheer and money for
drinks
Parking: ample parking behind the Hotel Northampton
For More information: www.hidden-tech.net

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: HIDDEN-TECH PRESENTS: HOLIDAY SOCIAL AT THE HOTEL NORTHAMPTON COOLIDGE CAFE BA
